name: Chef Altaf Hussain
title: Owner & Managing Director .......
tagline: Leading with passion, serving with excellence
bio:
Altaf founded Altaf Catering and serves as the Owner & Managing Director. With over a decade of experience in the catering business, he leads operations, client relations and strategic direction — ensuring consistent quality and service across every event. He manages the leadership team and coordinates with chefs, vendors and clients to deliver flawless experiences.

His vision is to make Altaf Catering the most trusted name in Pakistan's catering industry, known for exceptional food quality, professional service, and memorable experiences. Under his leadership, the company has grown from a small operation to one of the region's premier catering services.
achievements: Established partnerships with top venues across Pakistan
